name: Adventure Escape: Xmas Killer
summary: Detective Kate Gray is back in a new holiday murder mystery! A homicide victim is found downtown holding a familiar calling card - a snow globe. Kate realizes she is on the trail of the notoriously dangerous serial murderer, “The Christmas Killer.” Will the killer strike again in seven days? Or can Kate and her team solve this mystery in time for the holidays? Put your wits to the test now in Adventure Escape: The Christmas Killer!
